name: 林家薇
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生奠定英語基礎，以促進英語聽、說、讀、寫能力之提升，並教導學生自學、自修的方法，提高英語學習的興趣。
schedule:
Week	Content
1	Orientation
2-4	Reading Unit 1~2 & Listening Unit 1~2:
What are some popular kinds of books?
What do you know about New Year’s Greetings?
5-7	Reading Unit 3~4 & Listening Unit 3~4:
What do you know about famous palaces?
What animals are useful to humans?
8	Reading Unit 5 & Listening Unit 5:
What do you know about gift giving?
9	Midterm exam and Proficiency Test
10-11	Reading Unit 6 & Listening Unit 6:
What are some typical foods from around the world?
12-14	Reading Unit 7~8 & Listening Unit 7~8:
What do you know about Northern Europe?
What are some unusual plants?
15-17	Reading Unit 9~10 & Listening Unit 9~10:
What are some famous structures around the world?
What kinds of bad weather are there?
18	Final Exam and Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
期中考 	30%
期末考 	30%
平時成績	40%
materials:
Required Textbooks 教科書目:
What a World 1: Listening by Milada Broukal (Longman)
What a World 1: Reading by Milada Broukal (Longman)
